about_the_game:
The game world of Build A Friend consists of a runner and a management adventure. Robots are our friends now. In the runner, you create a robot following the sample on each level. Each time you should choose the right door to win at the end of a level. On your way, you have such obstacles as a breaker, a laser, a press, and a fire gun. The money you collect on a runner level may be spent on your factory improvement. Bright surroundings and 3D sound effects merge you into a wonderful world of fun and entertainment.
At the factory, you manage repair slots and upgrade them to fix damaged robots. You also need oil tanks to maintain the job. The more robots you fix the more reward you get. Get game rewards and spend playing dollars to improve your proper factory.
Try to become a part of this marvelous universe, and you will be absolutely fascinated! Bright colors, pleasant design as well as funny robots help you relax during the day. Game mechanics is pretty simple, so even a child can enjoy the atmosphere of the app. Build a Friend unites the whole family together. The best option to make friends with robots is to download the game now.

Feature points of the game app

- Unique gameplay
- Simple control
- 2 games in one app
- Upgrades your logic

- Outstanding graphics and stereo sounds
- Considered theme
- Game time is not limited
- Suitable for kids

- Makes you relaxed
- A good time killer
- Available offline

Get rid of loneliness and make friends!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13
  • Processor: M1 or Intel Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: M1 or Radeon Pro 450 with 2 GB or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Build A Friend

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Inter Core i5 or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
